plugin_info.plugin_description: Import a PYWR json file into Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: For more information visit hydra platform website

arg.name: json_file
arg.help: JSON file containing the Pywr network

arg.name: project-id
arg.help: ID of the project where network will be imported to. If excluded, a new project will be created.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config
